title: Stage Lv3-P2-S09
description: Level 3 grammar practice focusing on stage-specific patterns and expressions.
examples: If I were rich, I would travel around the world. (variant 1)
If I had left early, I wouldn't have been late. (variant 1)
learning_points: Level 3 target grammar and expressions with practical usage examples

sentences.kr: 만약 부자라면 세계여행을 할 텐데요. (확장 1)
sentences.en: If I were rich, I would travel around the world. (variant 1)

sentences.kr: 만약 일찍 출발했다면 지각하지 않았을 거예요. (확장 1)
sentences.en: If I had left early, I wouldn't have been late. (variant 1)

sentences.kr: 시간이 있다면 당신을 도와줄 수 있어요. (확장 1)
sentences.en: If I had time, I could help you. (variant 1)

sentences.kr: 만약 그것을 알았다면 말해줬을 텐데요. (확장 1)
sentences.en: If I had known that, I would have told you. (variant 1)

sentences.kr: 더 열심히 공부했다면 합격했을 거예요. (확장 1)
sentences.en: If I had studied harder, I would have passed. (variant 1)

sentences.kr: 만약 날씨가 좋다면 피크닉을 갈 텐데요. (확장 1)
sentences.en: If the weather were nice, we would go on a picnic. (variant 1)

sentences.kr: 그 조언을 들었다면 실수하지 않았을 거예요. (확장 1)
sentences.en: If I had listened to the advice, I wouldn't have made mistakes. (variant 1)

sentences.kr: 만약 당신이라면 어떻게 하겠어요? (확장 1)
sentences.en: What would you do if you were me? (variant 1)

sentences.kr: 만약 그 기회가 있었다면 잡았을 거예요. (확장 1)
sentences.en: If I had had the opportunity, I would have taken it. (variant 1)

sentences.kr: 더 젊다면 다시 도전할 텐데요. (확장 1)
sentences.en: If I were younger, I would try again. (variant 1)

sentences.kr: 만약 부자라면 세계여행을 할 텐데요. (확장 2)
sentences.en: If I were rich, I would travel around the world. (variant 2)
